thread.section_title: Coopmanhuijs Boutique Hotel & Spa - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Stellenbosch, South Africa) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent location
thread.title_full: Excellent location - Review of Coopmanhuijs Boutique Hotel & Spa, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: Babysitter28
title: Excellent location
text: A beautiful jewel of a hotel well located in Stellenbosch. Our room was a good size with a nice big bathroom and a good sized deck to sit out on. While dining at the restaurant, you can choose from several different seating locations and I would highly recommend sitting outside in front of the hotel on the terrace and watch the bustling street. Atmosphere was fantastic.
